tossup_question: 3) PHYSICS  What will happen if a wire of length L is cut into two or more parts?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Each part can hold one-fourth the weight as full length wire
X) Each part can hold half the weight as full length wire
Y) Each part can hold the same weight as full length wire
Z) Each part can hold twice the weight as full length wire
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Y) Each part can hold the same weight as full length wire
bonus_question: 3) PHYSICS  A 20kg box is dropped 15m. How much work was done on the box? Assume gravity = 10m/s^2.
